title: Advance Calculator
description: A responsive web-based calculator built with Next.js, featuring basic arithmetic, scientific functions, and a clean modern UI.

title: Does Urbanization Affect Power Outages?
description: An analytical project for DSC 80 at UCSD analyzing major power outages in the U.S. from January 2000 to July 2016. Uses data from Purdue University's infrastructure lab.

title: Interactive General Knowledge Quiz
description: An interactive quiz application using a doubly linked list to store and traverse questions and answers. Demonstrates data structures, algorithmic thinking, and frontend interactivity.

title: League of Legends Win Rate Analysis
description: Analyzes win rates by region using professional esports match data from Oracle’s Elixir. Applies hypothesis testing and statistical analysis to study competitive balance across leagues.

title: Mapping Boston Cycling Routes
description: An interactive map visualizing bike routes and station-level trip activity across Boston and Cambridge, highlighting urban mobility patterns over a single day.

title: Mouse Activity and Temperature Analysis
description: Interactive visualizations exploring minute-level fluctuations in mouse core body temperature and activity over a 14-day period, revealing circadian rhythms, gender differences, and estrus cycles.

title: San Diego Transit Accessibility Analysis
description: A GIS-based analysis of public transit accessibility across San Diego County. Identifies transit deserts using spatial buffers and census data, and proposes policy improvements via an interactive StoryMap.

title: FashionMNIST Model Comparison Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard comparing MLP and CNN models trained on the FashionMNIST dataset. Visualizes accuracy, confidence scores, misclassifications, and confusion matrices using PyTorch and Streamlit.

title: Differential Privacy – Synthetic Telemetry Evaluation
description: Capstone project exploring user-level differential privacy on synthetic telemetry data. Implements and evaluates Gaussian and Laplace mechanisms to measure privacy-utility trade-offs using L∞ error and IOU metrics across 100 randomized runs.

title: SUPPORT2 Differential Privacy Analysis
description: Applies differential privacy techniques to the SUPPORT2 clinical dataset. Compares non-private and DP-trained models using AUC, L∞ error, and downstream utility metrics to study privacy-utility trade-offs in healthcare data.

title: MNIST Neural Network – 10 Digit Classification
description: Implements neural networks from scratch to classify handwritten digits (0–9) from the MNIST dataset. Explores model architecture, training dynamics, and performance trade-offs.

title: Sorting Algorithm Visualization
description: A visual and interactive demonstration of classic sorting algorithms including Bubble Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort. Highlights algorithmic complexity, comparisons, and swap operations in real time.
